metadata.name: Potential In-Memory Download And Compile Of Payloads
metadata.comment: Detects potential in-memory downloading and compiling of applets using curl and osacompile as seen used by XCSSET malware

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osacompile')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('curl')))

output.summary: Detects potential in-memory downloading and compiling of applets using curl and osacompile as seen used by XCSSET malware
